ygData.subject: RE: Clouding
ygData.msgSnippet: I have several customers that I would like to cast See Invoice on.  Despite repeated mailings they still claim that they never got them .  I have come to
ygData.messageBody:
I have several customers that I would like to cast See Invoice on. Despite
repeated mailings they still claim that they "never got them". I have come
to suspect that the Invoices have somehow become invisible in transit and
are actually in their in boxes. Can you tell me where this song/spell is
found? It sounds like Ak'Anon or Erudin libraries perhaps?

[46 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work

> A possible theory I've heard so far (also mentioned by
> someone here) is that there are mobs that cast see invoice
> on others.

> While the cast see invoice theory may be the answer - I've been
> attacked so many times trying to get to and from the
> graveyard/cave area - I believe that Verant added See Invoice
> to some of those mobs...
>
> Slyde
